attributes.action: to fulfil the promise made by jackstraw in 2002 and let art 95b and art 3 of Regs 1408/71 become UK Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to UK citizens xpats disabled
who recieved DLA pre 1.6.92 have moved or going to move abroad and have been refused benefits read this in 2002 jack straw promised the eu commission he would include 95b and art 3 of 1408/71 into uk law. we allege this did not happen and we have the letter to prove he made the promise if it had happened our daughter Lucy would have got her incapacity benefit and we fear many others are like lucy. we are now waiting to here from the uk tribunal if we can go to the court of justice in europe. please suport this petition to get the uk to honour thier promise.please suport us thank you blessyou all
